column5: Does anyone know how walleye sanctuary's opening dates are determined ?Example- This year on Minnitaki Sanctuary's opened on the wed June 15th.Any way to determine next years opening........is it based on date or second full week of june ? Need to book cabin asap.Any info would be greatly appreciated.
Should be the 15th of June in 2012. ****, I miss the Rice River & my name sake...Red Pine Bay. john
